00004 namespace mlpack

00008 class SVDIncompleteIncrementalLearning
00009 {
00010  public:
00011   SVDIncompleteIncrementalLearning(double u = 0.001,
00012                                    double kw = 0,
00013                                    double kh = 0)
00014           : u(u), kw(kw), kh(kh)
00015     {}
00016 
00017   template<typename MatType>
00018   void Initialize(const MatType& dataset, const size_t rank)
00019   {
00020     (void)rank;
00021   
00022     n = dataset.n_rows;
00023     m = dataset.n_cols;
00024 
00025     currentUserIndex = 0;
00026   }
00027 
00044   template<typename MatType>
00045   inline void WUpdate(const MatType& V,
00046                       arma::mat& W,
00047                       const arma::mat& H)
00048   {
00049     arma::mat deltaW(n, W.n_cols);
00050     deltaW.zeros();
00051     for(size_t i = 0;i < n;i++)
00052     {
00053       double val;
00054       if((val = V(i, currentUserIndex)) != 0)
00055         deltaW.row(i) += (val - arma::dot(W.row(i), H.col(currentUserIndex))) *
00056                                          arma::trans(H.col(currentUserIndex));
00057       if(kw != 0) deltaW.row(i) -= kw * W.row(i);
00058     }
00059 
00060     W += u*deltaW;
00061   }
00062 
00072   template<typename MatType>
00073   inline void HUpdate(const MatType& V,
00074                       const arma::mat& W,
00075                       arma::mat& H)
00076   {
00077     arma::mat deltaH(H.n_rows, 1);
00078     deltaH.zeros();
00079 
00080     for(size_t i = 0;i < n;i++)
00081     {
00082       double val;
00083       if((val = V(i, currentUserIndex)) != 0)
00084         deltaH += (val - arma::dot(W.row(i), H.col(currentUserIndex))) *
00085                                                     arma::trans(W.row(i));
00086     }
00087     if(kh != 0) deltaH -= kh * H.col(currentUserIndex);
00088 
00089     H.col(currentUserIndex++) += u * deltaH;
00090     currentUserIndex = currentUserIndex % m;
00091   }
00092 
00093  private:
00094   double u;
00095   double kw;
00096   double kh;
00097 
00098   size_t n;
00099   size_t m;
00100 
00101   size_t currentUserIndex;
00102 };

00105 inline void SVDIncompleteIncrementalLearning::
00106                                     WUpdate<arma::sp_mat>(const arma::sp_mat& V,
00107                                                           arma::mat& W,
00108                                                           const arma::mat& H)
00109 {
00110   arma::mat deltaW(n, W.n_cols);
00111   deltaW.zeros();
00112   for(arma::sp_mat::const_iterator it = V.begin_col(currentUserIndex);
00113                                       it != V.end_col(currentUserIndex);it++)
00114   {
00115     double val = *it;
00116     size_t i = it.row();
00117     deltaW.row(i) += (val - arma::dot(W.row(i), H.col(currentUserIndex))) *
00118                                          arma::trans(H.col(currentUserIndex));
00119     if(kw != 0) deltaW.row(i) -= kw * W.row(i);
00120   }
00121 
00122   W += u*deltaW;
00123 }
